title: Barcelona forward Ousmane Dembele suffers fresh injury setback
description: Barcelona forward Ousmane Dembele has suffered another hamstring injury and will be out of action for between three and four weeks, the La Liga leaders said on Monday.
content: The French winger, who was signed last year from Borussia Dortmund for a fee which could rise to Â£130m, suffered a hamstring tear on his debut in September that kept him out until January.Dembele featured in four games after returning, starting one, before suffering a new problem in the 4-2 win over Real Sociedad on Sunday."Tests have confirmed that the player has suffered a hamstring injury of the semitendinosus muscle that does not affect the area operated on earlier in the season," Barcelona said in a statement.Dembele will miss Copa del Rey and La Liga matches but should return before the Champions League last-16 clash against Chelsea at Stamford Bridge on February 20.Captain Andres Iniesta, who was on the bench against Real Sociedad, also has a problem in his right calf and is a doubt for the Copa del Rey match at Espanyol on Wednesday.
